response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. After careful consideration, we propose to offer this exceptional item to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $15,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. We understand that such a decision requires thoughtful consideration, so please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and providing you with the best experience possible.", "product_price": 12000}
